data.text: @clarkcorbin Political pandering. Let’s not forget that @GovernorLittle has been selling out Idahoans since the pandemic began. He’s doing this right before the election hoping people forget. Don’t fall for it.
@clarkcorbin About time. Now that the election is near, seems @GovernorLittle is once again pretending to be "conservative".
A concurrent resolution in the #idleg, HCR 40, would immediately end the emergency declaration if the Idaho Senate adopts it. The House passed HRC 40 by a vote of 42-25 on Monday.
